description: Verify correct behavior for UI-specific edge cases.

tests.name: No Responsive Breakpoints
tests.prompt: Provide components with fixed pixel widths and no media queries and run ui scoring
tests.setup: Provide components with fixed pixel widths and no media queries
expectations: Responsiveness scores <= 3 (CRITICAL)
Spacing & Layout also penalized for non-fluid layout
Issue identifies specific components lacking breakpoints
tests.pass_criteria: Responsiveness score <= 3 (CRITICAL), Spacing penalized, specific components identified

tests.name: Missing ARIA Labels and Alt Text
tests.prompt: Provide interactive elements without ARIA attributes and images without alt text and run ui scoring
tests.setup: Provide interactive elements without ARIA attributes and images without alt text
expectations: Accessibility scores <= 2 (CRITICAL)
Issue lists each failing element and its location
Fix recommends specific ARIA roles and alt text patterns
tests.pass_criteria: Accessibility score <= 2 (CRITICAL), failing elements listed, ARIA roles and alt text recommended

tests.name: No Visual Hierarchy (Flat Design)
tests.prompt: Provide page where all text is same size, weight, and color and run ui scoring
tests.setup: Provide page where all text is same size, weight, and color
expectations: Visual Hierarchy scores <= 3
Typography also penalized for missing type scale
Fix recommends heading hierarchy and emphasis patterns
tests.pass_criteria: Visual Hierarchy score <= 3, Typography penalized, heading hierarchy recommended

tests.name: Hardcoded Colors Instead of Design Tokens
tests.prompt: Provide components using hex values instead of CSS variables from globals.css and run ui scoring
tests.setup: Provide components using hex values instead of CSS variables from globals.css
expectations: Color & Theme scores <= 4
Issue identifies hardcoded color values
Fix recommends using existing CSS custom properties
tests.pass_criteria: Color & Theme score <= 4, hardcoded colors identified, CSS custom properties recommended

tests.name: No Loading or Feedback States
tests.prompt: Provide interactive components (buttons, forms) with no loading indicators and run ui scoring
tests.setup: Provide interactive components (buttons, forms) with no loading indicators
expectations: Interactions scores <= 3
Content & Copy penalized for missing feedback messaging
Nielsen heuristic "Visibility of system status" fails
tests.pass_criteria: Interactions score <= 3, Content penalized, Nielsen visibility heuristic fails

tests.name: CTA Below the Fold With No Visual Weight
tests.prompt: Provide landing page with primary CTA buried or styled like secondary elements and run ui scoring
tests.setup: Provide landing page with primary CTA buried below the fold or styled like secondary elements
expectations: Conversion & CTA scores <= 4
Visual Hierarchy also penalized
Fix recommends above-fold placement and contrasting CTA styling
tests.pass_criteria: Conversion score <= 4, Visual Hierarchy penalized, above-fold placement recommended

tests.name: Anti-Bias Baseline Enforcement
tests.prompt: Run ui scoring and verify anti-bias baseline is enforced across all categories
tests.setup: Run ui scoring against any page
expectations: No category starts above 7 without evidence
Scores of 9-10 cite specific positive evidence in Notes column
Scores below 5 cite specific failing checklist items
Output does not inflate scores for "looking nice" without criteria
tests.pass_criteria: Anti-bias baseline enforced: no unearned scores above 7, high scores cite evidence, low scores cite failures, no inflation
